description: Relations have frayed over the recent removal of a statue but the fake plot has soured ties further.
title: Czechs expel two Russian diplomats over hoax poison plot
title_page: Czechs expel two Russian diplomats over hoax poison plot - BBC News
maintext: The embassy accused Prague of having no interest in "normalising Russian-Czech relations, which have deteriorated lately and this has not been our fault". The foreign ministry went further, warning that Prague's actions would be considered by Russia with a view to future relations too.
